definition: clear and logical
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

is/are/am/yes/to be

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Mom, you talk well, but can you appreciate that kind of art?
sentences.chinese: 媽媽，你說得頭頭是道，但你能欣賞那種藝術嗎？

sentences.english: Although our only three people, but size officials also had hit all the right notes.
sentences.chinese: 雖然我家只有三口人，但是大小官員也分得頭頭是道。

sentences.english: And it was a long apprenticeship, learning to tell stories.
sentences.chinese: 要把故事講的頭頭是道，還得經歷一個漫長的學徒期。

sentences.english: YangGuang listen to JiWei pronouncing on, no longer ask JiWei sin.
sentences.chinese: 楊廣聽姬威說得頭頭是道，不再問姬威的罪。

definition: to disdain as beneath contempt (idiom)
to talk big/to sound off/bombastic/grandiloquent
lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree/fig. to scold sb indirectly/to make oblique accusations (idiom)
red in the face/extremely angry
lit. a deluge of heavenly flowers (idiom)/fig. extravagant embellishments/hype
to weigh up sb's words and observe their facial expression (idiom)/to discern what sb thinks from his body language
self-taught/to learn without a teacher (idiom)
to gesticulate while talking (idiom)/to explain by waving one's hands/to criticize or give orders summarily
profound mystery
dumbstruck and unable to reply (idiom); left speechless/at a loss for words
to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
clumsy/all thumbs
to show every possible consideration (idiom); meticulous care
to touch on sth and leave it there/to take care not to overdo sth
to resign oneself to adversity (idiom); to grin and bear it/to submit meekly to insults, maltreatment, humiliation etc
